description: Comedian Tig Notaro is credited with performing the stand-out stand-up show in recent memory, “LIVE,” which is now being released in an extended, special edition with part of the proceeds benefiting cancer charities. Here she tells us a new story having her wisdom teeth removed…which led to some pretty unwise behavior.

contentencoded:
Comedian Tig Notaro is credited with performing the stand-out stand-up show in recent memory, “LIVE,” which is now being released in an extended, special edition with part of the proceeds benefiting cancer charities.


Here she tells us a new story having her wisdom teeth removed…which led to some pretty unwise behavior.
teaser: Comedian Tig Notaro is credited with performing the stand-out stand-up show in recent memory, “LIVE,” which is now being released in an extended, special edition with part of the proceeds benefiting cancer charities. Here she tells us a new story having her wisdom teeth removed…which led to some pretty unwise behavior.
title: Tig Notaro Screams Bloody Murder
